props.border: Puts a border on the alert. Accepts **top** \| **end** \| **bottom** \| **start**.
props.borderColor: Specifies the color of the border. Accepts any color value.
props.closable: Adds a close icon that can hide the alert.
props.closeIcon: Change the default icon used for **closable** alerts.
props.closeLabel: Text used for *aria-label* on **closable** alerts. Can also be customized globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization).
props.color: Applies specified color to the control - it can be the name of material color (for example `success` or `purple`) or css color (`#033` or `rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)`). You can find a list of built-in classes on the [colors page](/styles/colors#material-colors).
props.elevation: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).
props.height: Sets the height for the component.
props.maxHeight: Sets the maximum height for the component.
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the component.
props.minHeight: Sets the minimum height for the component.
props.minWidth: Sets the minimum width for the component.
props.prominent: Displays a larger vertically centered icon to draw more attention.
props.text: Specify subtitle/body text for the alert.
props.title: Specify title text for the alert.
props.transition: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the [built in transitions](/styles/transitions) or one your own.
props.type: Specify a **success**, **info**, **warning** or **error** alert. Uses the contextual color and has a pre-defined icon.
props.value: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
props.width: Sets the width for the component.

slots.append: Slot for icon at end of alert.
slots.close: Slot for icon used in **dismissible** prop.
slots.prepend: Slot for icon at beginning of alert.

functions.toggle: Toggles the alert's active state. Available in the close slot and used as the click action in **dismissible**.
